content.description: A student designs an experiment to investigate the influence of temperature on enzyme function. The student’s plan is presented in Table 1.
content.question: Table 1. An experiment to investigate the influence of temperature on enzyme function Test Tube Substrate Added Enzyme Added Temperature <math alttext="in degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>(</mtext><mi>°</mi><mtext>C</mtext><mtext>)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> 1 Yes No 10 2 Yes Yes 10 3 Yes No 20 4 Yes Yes 20 5 Yes No 30 6 Yes Yes 30 7 Yes No 40 8 Yes Yes 40 Which test tubes are controls in the experiment?

skill.text: 3.C: Identify experimental procedures that align with the question, including: i. identifying dependent and independent variables ii. identifying appropriate controls iii. justifying appropriate controls
